title: Listed
description: Theme: Hi-Lo, High school girls, best friends forever, growing up Shane is so drawn to Coach Rob that she can t see she s being played. Marisa begins to feel like her old self. It s like a weight has been lifted. And Brandi still can t shake her bad luck with relationships. She s on a dating break, but will she brush off a great guy? All bets are off when the three girls are listed in a threatening note. The PCH novels are approximately 25,000 words -- 200 Pages. Each story covers a semester and focuses on one of the three main characters., with swirling subplots involving the other girls. These best friends are determined to make the most of high school. And not get swallowed up."
author: Shannon Freeman
